About Myself

Hey there!
I go by the name N Krithick Santhosh. Stringed together, it mean "Creator of Happiness" and it also has an amazing ring to it!
I hail from Kalpakkam, Tamilnadu which is about 70 kilometers away from chennai and about a mile from the nuclear reactor (Ever wondered why am so (radio)active in doing stuff?).
Am currently pursing my B.Tech in Aerospace Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur.
